name: Heiko-Do
description:
Made in only 72 hours for
the ScoreSpace Jam #8
Theme: Balance


Controls

A/D - Move
W - Jump
SPACE - Attack


How to play

Try to survive as long as you can without falling down or getting defeated by your demons!


Score Every kill100-150Every succesfull attack
10-30
Every half second spent in perfect balance
(Every 2 consecutive seconds 10 points more)
10 + 10*second/2
Time survived
10*second

Credits

Art by Eggy
Music and SFX by IainWay
